import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import"../App.css";import"../stylesheets/Home.css";import large_logo from"../assets/large_logo.png";import{GoogleMap,Marker,LoadScript}from'@react-google-maps/api';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Home(){const[studySpots,setStudySpots]=useState([]);const navigate=useNavigate();// useNavigate hook for navigation
useEffect(()=>{fetch('https://studyspots-0c86b8a5475e.herokuapp.com/api/study_spots').then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>{setStudySpots(data);}).catch(error=>{console.error('Error fetching study spots:',error);});},[]);const onMarkerClick=spot=>{navigate("/".concat(encodeURIComponent(spot.building)));};const renderMarkers=()=>{return studySpots.map((spot,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Marker,{position:{lat:spot.lat,lng:spot.long},name:spot.name,onClick:()=>onMarkerClick(spot)},index));};const initialCenter={lat:43.0766,lng:-89.4125};const containerStyle={width:'100%',height:'400px'};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"home page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{id:"large-logo",src:large_logo,alt:"badger burrow"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LoadScript,{googleMapsApiKey:"AIzaSyB0DSQyxeTXhJzRNEVwQ3khFG7QHX53Yxo",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(GoogleMap,{mapContainerStyle:containerStyle,center:initialCenter,zoom:16,children:[renderMarkers(),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Marker,{onClick:()=>navigate('/current-location'),name:'Current location'})]})})]});}export default Home;
